vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐκπορ-εύω,
make to go out, fetch out, [Refs 5th c.BC+]:—middle, with future middle [Refs 5th c.BC+] and aorist passive, go out or forth, march out, X.[same place], etc.; ἐπὶ λείαν [Refs 4th c.BC+]; εἰς στρατείαν ἐ. to march out to a place.., [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; but ἐκ τοῦ χάρακος [LXX+5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to go out, come out, leave
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to go out, come out, leave
to go from, or out of a place, depart from, Mk. 11:19; 13:1; to be voided, Mk. 7:19; to be cast out, Mt. 17:21; to proceed from, be spoken, Mt. 4:4; 15:11; to burst forth, Rev. 4:5; to be spread abroad, Lk. 4:37; to flow out, Rev. 22:1; from the Hebrew, ἐκπορεύομαι καὶ εἰσπορεύομαι. see εἰσέρχομαι, Acts 9:28
vocabInfos._es_Definition: ir o salir ; venir de ; resucitar (de los muertos ; propagarse, difundirse (LUC.4:37) ; comenzar un viaje (MAR.10:17)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (從一處到另一處) 去
1a) 抽象的
1b) 提到地點
1c) 提到目標
2) 來, 出去, 進行
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) (从一处到另一处) 去
1a) 抽象的
1b) 提到地点
1c) 提到目标
2) 来, 出去, 进行
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đi ra (từ); xuất phát từ; ra
